creator: med1985@gmail.com
text: There's a superfluous call to java.awt.GraphicsEnvironment.getLocalGraphicsEnvironment().getDefaultScreenDevice().getDefaultConfiguration(). I don't believe this is necessary and can use the same configuration as the PDF/PS/AFP-Graphics2D classes. I don't have tests for this, but it seems fairly obvious from looking at the code (though that could be hubris!)
